basic.description: Limits, Continuity, C', and linear approximations of functions of several variables. Multiple integrals and Jacobians, Line and surface integrals. The theorems of Green, Stokes, and Gauss.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Advanced Calculus

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites: APSC 172, APSC 174
Exclusions: MATH 221, MTHE 227 (MATH 227)
